[ Khalad ] Hell@w2 no.@w4 With your help, I can fast-track some of my plans.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] So what's the plan?@p6 [ Khalad ] You have constructors, right?@w4 I'll need your help to produce weapons.@w2 Proper weapons for my people and distribute them to the village and ziggurat.@w3 Crossbows are good for hunting game and taking out the occasional zirax patrol, but they're no good against heavy armor and drones.@p9 [ Khalad ] That's only the start.@w6 You saw my computer@w2... you didn't mess with my settings, did you?@w3 Anyway, i've mapped the enemy patrols as well as their shipments from the Spaceport to the Drone base.@w4 The shipment coming up next has something i'll need.@p9 [ Khalad ] While you're distributing weapons, i'll sabotage their route so we can hop on get what we need from them.@w5 From there...@w3 we'll see. @w5 Hell,@w2 It probably won't work.@w3 But at least we can say we tried, right?
Certainty of death, small chance of success... What are we waiting for?
[ Khalad ] Okay,@w2 it's settled!@w4 Give me a while to get things organized here and i'll draw up the plans.@w6 Thanks again@w3... for your help, I mean.

[ Khalad ] You're right on time, {PlayerName}.@w3 I've just finished running the numbers and drawing up the next stage of the plans.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] So what's the plan here?@w4 This is your planet,@w2 so you know the lay of the land better than I do.@p8 [ Khalad ] The number of troops are fairly consistent; most of them are blanks.@w3 The biggest problem the Tal'on face are those damned drones.@w3 Even a crossbow can take out an armored zirax if you hit them in the right place, but those drones are just too durable.@p9 [ Khalad ] The weapons your people carried could take them down with a few well-placed through the eye on the front; or an entire unit of ammunition through the body.@w4 Our weapons don't have the speed or penetration of your firearms and the zirax have outlawed us from even possessing the precursors to gunpowder.@p9 [ Khalad ] Those drones need to be destroyed...@w2 every single one of them.@w4 We need your weapons to do that.
<color=#2eafff>Will your people be able to use UCH weaponry if we give it to them?</color>

[ Khalad ] You've seen the zirax troops that attacked us right?@w3 We call them 'blanks' because of their blank stares.@w4 It's because they're cloned soldiers.@w4 Most of the empire's footsoldiers are all clones.@w4 They can follow orders and do all the usual things that regular soldiers do,@w2 but they lack creativity and natural curiosity.@w4 It makes them very...@w2 predictable.@p9 [ Khalad ] Oh, They do have regular non-cloned soldiers in there. But not in places like this.@w3 Most of them have technical jobs or are officers.@w5 The commander of the Drone Base,@w2 they call him 'Captain Dreadarm' due to his preference of flogging his subordinates.@p9 [ Khalad ] He's a real bastard, that one.@w3 One of these days,@w2 sometime soon,@w2 I look forward to throwing him off the top of his Drone Base.@w8 Everything is his fault...

[ Khalad ] Because it is personal.@w3 At least for me it is...@w5 My parents were hunters,@w2 far from zirax patrol lines tracking a large pack of Cresters.@w3 They'd followed them to a stream covered by brush...@p7 [ Khalad ] A drone found them there...@w6 They didn't try and shoot at it.@w3 Their weapons were found on the ground at their feet.@w4 They had SURRENDERED!@w2 the drone should've ignored them!@w5 Only an operated drone could ignore that rule.@w3 Someone gave it the order to shoot them.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm sorry, Khalad...@p6 [ Khalad ] It happened a long time ago...@w8 I ended up in the care of my Uncle, the shaman.@w4 He tried to get me into The Order,@w3 taught me how to read, write and talk all proper-like.@w3 He wasn't all too happy that I joined the Hunters like my parents.@p8 [ Khalad ] And, well...@w2 you know the rest.
<color=#2eafff>Your uncle taught you? Is that why don't sound all formal and stiff like Na'tuk?</color>

[ Khalad ] Just because we live in wooden huts doesn't make us savages.@w5 The Zirax forbid our people technology.@w3 They can't really do anything about knowledge.@w3 We've been passing that down for generations.@p8 [ Khalad ] Your weapons aren't any more complicated than the ones the Zirax use,@w2 and most Hunters have seen zirax firearms in action.@w4 Usually when the blanks are out doing weapons training in the forest or when one of those damned drones decides to massacre a herd of tri-horns.

[ Khalad ] Just one more reason why I don't want to be Chief.@w5 They talk like that intentionally, you know?@w3 They do it so that the regular people of the clan will think that their words are wise and profound.@w6 It always rubbed me the wrong way once i'd found out about it from my uncle.@p9 [ Khalad ] I learned a lot from my uncle...@w4 even what he knew about this 'advanced technology', which isn't really supposed to be taught outside the Shamanic Order.@w5 If we're going to arm the people,@w2 we'll probably need his help.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] If we want to head off any pre-emptive attacks on the villages, they'll need weapons.@w5 They'll get upset and complain.@w4 There's nothing either of us can do except make sure that they have the weapons handy if they need them.@w4 Beyond that, it'll be up to them to use them if and when the time comes.
<color=#2eafff>I'll get onto making those weapons. How many are we talking here?</color>

[ Khalad ] Probably around 60 of your Weapons in batches of 20 would be easiest.@w4 That'll be a bit awkward to carry, won't it?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I can probably fabricate a few boxes to store them in.@w3 It'll be fine.@w5 The real problem will be trying to convince the villagers to take the weapons.@p8 [ Khalad ] My uncle should be able to help with that.@w4 Bring the boxes to him and explain the situation.@w3 Hopefully he'll listen.@p7 [ Khalad ] While you're doing that,@w2 i'll try and sabotage the Zirax Convoy's route.
[ {PlayerName} ]\nI don't have the weapon crate for the village with me!@w3\nI'd better go back and get it now or else i'll look like an idiot later.

[ Shaman Turell ] Traveller? You're alright?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm alright, Shaman.@w2 But what's happened here?@w4 There are more of the village guards here than there was the other day.@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] We had to pull in all the hunters to protect the village early this morning.@w4 There was a fire in one of the outlying farms.@w3 When a group of hunters saw the smoke they went to help put out the fire...@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] It was a Xenu Firesquad...@w3 They burned the entire farm and killed the occupants and workers...

[ Shaman Turell ] I am afraid my old friend Na'tuk believes that it is over.@w4 That the deaths of the farmers are retribution for the soldiers Ki'eve led that you killed.@w4 He is one of only a handful who believe that and he refuses to change his mind.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] Myself and Ku'reil the Huntmaster, do not believe so and have recalled the remaining Hunters to bolster the village guards, under the guise of funerary observance of the victims.@w4 Dishonorable though it may be,@w2 the safety of the people is more important than the memory of the recently dead.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] Enough of that for now!@w3 The last I saw of you, you were heading to the Great Ziggurat to find my nephew.@w3 Did you ever manage to find him?@w2 Did you tell him to come home?
<color=#2eafff>I found him, but he's not ready to become chief.</color>

[ Shaman Turell ] If you are expressing condolences for the dead,@w2 that is much appreciated.@w4 But if you're apologizing for causing this conflict between us and the zirax...@w3 well, it's been a long time in the making.@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] Ever since your ships came crashing out of the sky, tensions in and out of the clan have been on the rise.@w3 If not for you, one or another of your people would've eventually come along and stirred the young hunters to action.@w3 It was unavoidable.@w2 You don't need to blame yourself for that, traveller.
<color=#2eafff>Others will. But what will happen now?</color>

[ Shaman Turell ] At least he's not dead...@w4 I've worried that myself often.@w2 Wondered if he died out there after I had him sent away...@w5 Please, tell me how he is.@p9 < You relate to Shaman Turell what Khalad has been up to >@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] I am not surprised.@w3 I'm not happy about his choices or actions,@w2 but I suppose I have no claim over what he does or does not do.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] You'll be seeing him yourself soon enough.@w2 You can express your disappointment to him in person, revered shaman.@p6 [ Shaman Turell ] I believe you said he wasn't willing to come back.@w4 For what purpose would he come here now?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] To bring you ammunition for these-

[ Shaman Turell ] What is THIS?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Weapons capable of taking down those drones and mechanoids far better than those crossbows you're using right now, Shaman.@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] But,@w2 But...@w2 This is a violation of the zirax commandments!@w3 They will kill us all if we use them!@w4 We cannot take them!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] If only the village guards have them nearby and they need to use them to defend the village against an attack,@w2 you can be damned well sure that they're here to kill you all anyway.@w3 At least this way you can give as good as you get if the shit hits the fan.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] This is Khalad's plan, isn't it? @w8 Alright...@w4 we will take the weapons but ONLY as a precaution and will keep them out of sight unless there's no other alternative.@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] Since we're commited now, you may as well take that second case to Huntmaster, Kureil.@w5 I know you two have had your differences,@w2 But now that the Hunters have been recalled, he is wise enough to recognize that a crossbow won't stop a drone.@w4 May the spirits guide you, Traveller.
[ {PlayerName} ]\nI don't have the weapon crate for the hunters with me!@w3\nI'd better go back and get it now or else i'll look like an idiot later.

[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] You again?@w4 What do you want this time?@w2 Can't you see that i'm busy with the mess you caused, Terran?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Nice to see you too, big guy.@w4 I've brought you something you might want.

[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] What is this?@w7 I see...@w5 And Turell has given this his permission for these?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] He has.@w4 They should be distributed to the defenders but kept out of sight unless you know the zirax are committing their forces to an attack.@w4 @p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Don't tell me how to organize my hunters, Terran.@w4 I know what i'm doing.@w6 If the zirax become aware of these weapons beforehand, it will cause them to commit their full forces, regardless of their earlier intentions.@w3 These weapons are forbidden.@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] At least...@w3 this gives us a chance.

[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] It is not looking good.@w3 The last group of hunters returned a hour ago, bringing with them refugees from the granary and quarry.@w3 Both buildings were destroyed by Xenu Firesquads.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] We can rule out retribution for a few soldiers.@w3 This is an extermination.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] And the chief?@p6 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] He stands idly by,@w2 trying to assure the villagers that the worst has passed.@w6 He will plead with the zirax outside these very gates before he orders us to attack.@w6 The best we can do now is pray that he is right...

[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] There is not much I can do.@w4 I must stand and watch as my people cower behind these walls as the zirax move ever closer.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Until the chief orders us to attack,@w2 we will stand here with our bows at the ready and your weapons hidden at our feet.@w5 I fear that we will never be given the order to attack and we will stand here uselessly until the very end...@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] It brings me much sadness that my chieftain would cling to peace in so desperate a situation...
<color=#2eafff>If he's not, you'll at least be able to defend yourselves from the drones.</color>
<color=#2eafff>The weapons may still prove useless without ammunition.</color>

[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Indeed.@w3 Ammunition may be a problem.@w6 We hunters have a stockpile of ammunition and a few weapons retrieved from enemies of the past.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Do not look so shocked.@w3 Did you think we have not had conflicts with our keepers in the two and a half centuries they have had us penned up in this prison world?@w5 Many of the older articles have deteriorated, but the ammunition appears undamaged.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I wouldn't trust it anyway.@w5 Someone will be by soon to deliver a case of newer ammunition,@w2 so you won't need to rely on antiques.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Sometimes old things are the best.@w3 But in the case of these weapons, I will trust your experience and leave the older ammunition for last.@w8 What will you do now, Terran?
<color=#2eafff>I need to deliver this lase case of weapons to the Ziggurat.</color>
[ Huntmaster Ku'reil ]\nThen I wish you good luck, Terran.@w4\nMay the spirits guide you to Empyrion.

[ Temple Guardian ] You're back!@w3 We thought the troopers would have gotten you.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] No, not me.@w3 Is the High Shaman still in the Sun Room?@p8 [ Temple Guardian ] He's currently overwhelmed trying to calm all the civilians we've pulled within our walls.@w4 He doesn't have time to deal with alien travellers.
<color=#2eafff>Even if i've brought something that will help you defend the Temple?</color>
<color=#2eafff>Even if i've brought something that will help you defend the Temple?</color>

[ Temple Guardian ] If you've got weapons in that case, the Shamans will not be happy with you bringing forbidden weapons onto the Temple grounds.@p8 [ Temple Guardian ] They'll probably be less happy when we have to fight armored drones with our crossbows.@w5 So while they probably won't thank you,@w2 On behalf of the Temple Guard, I will.@p8 [ Temple Guardian ] You can find one of the other Shaman in the Room of the Moon, straight ahead. Speak to whichever one is in charge down there and give him the case.@w6 Good Luck, friend.

[ Temple Guardian ] What have you brought?@w3 You have nothing with you.@w6 Go back to your camp, your ship or your hover vessel and bring it to the Shaman-in-charge in the Room of the Moon.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Ah yes, you're right.@w3 I forgot to bring the Weapons Case with me.@w4 Thank you for the guidance, I will bring the case to the shaman in the Lower Temple.
[ {PlayerName} ] Excuse me, revered Shaman.@w4 May I take a moment of your time?@p8 [ Moon Shaman ] You dare speak to me, Trespasser?!@w5 Who let one of YOUR kind into this sacred place?@p8
<color=#2eafff>I was sent here by Shaman Turell to deliver a 'vital piece of equipment' for the defenders of the Ziggurat.</color>
<color=#2eafff>I was sent here by Shaman Turell to deliver...</color> <color=#ff0000>Oh crap, I forgot to bring it. I'll be right back.</color>

[ Moon Shaman ] I do not care what you have brought, Terran!@w3 The great Ziggurat has no need for your help.@w4 Everything has already been taken care of.@w3 We will all be protected here.@w2 Leave!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] But Revered Shaman!@p4 [ Moon Shaman ] GUARDS!!@p7 [ Temple Guardian ] What is it that you need Shaman Dolmac?@p7 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Ah, Captain Ty'nan!@w5 Take this infidel from our holy place and cast them from the steps of the Ziggurat!@w5 Your 'help' is not wanted or needed here, Terran!

[ {PlayerName} ] Revered Shaman, Dolmac!@w3 I am trying to save the temple!@w3 The zirax are preparing to attack!@p8 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Lies!!@w4 The Zirax are not our enemies! They will not step foot in this place!@w5 Captain! Remove this heretic from my sight this instant!@p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Come with me peacefully, stranger...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] I can see why Khalad ruined his sermon now.@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You know Khalad?
<color=#2eafff>He's the reason i'm here right now. We're trying to stop the zirax from destroying the temple.</color>

[ {PlayerName} ] Captain!@w3 You are in charge of the defense of the Ziggurat, aren't you?@w6 Then this concerns you most of all.@p6 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Captain!@p3 [ Captain Ty'nan ] I am aware of the situation, stranger.@w3 What business is it of an outsider like you?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Myself and Khalad are working to help you with defenses against the drones and mechanoids the zirax will deploy to take the Ziggurat.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You know Khalad?
<color=#2eafff>He's the reason i'm here right now, talking to you.</color>

[ Captain Ty'nan ] You will explain.@p5 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Remove this deceiver immediately, Captain!@p5 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Dolmac.@w3 You are aware that I am in charge of the defense of this building are you not?@w4 That in all defensive matters my authority is above even the High Shaman Orizel, yes?@p7 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Well...@w4 yes,@w2 that is true... @w4 But...@p3 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You will be silent,@w2 Dolmac. @w5 And you, Terran@w3 will speak!@w2 Quickly.@p5 < You inform Captain Ty'nan of the plan to provide weapons to the defenders of the Ziggurat >@p9 [ Shaman Dolmac ] You cannot give those weapons to the Guardians!@w5 Even if you had enough,@w2 it is a violation of the Temple Guardian's Oath that they are forbidden from using the weapons of the enemy!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I am not the enemy, Dolmac!@p5 [ Captain Ty'nan ] As much as I am loath to admit it...@w2 He is right, Commander.@w5 You may not be our enemy, but your weapons are no different to those of the zirax;@w3 To the point that your ammunitions are compatible.@w3 It is too close for my liking.@p9 [ Shaman Dolmac ] I guess that's it then.@w4 Thank you for your assistance, Terran.@w3 But it seems you are unable to help the good Captain in his hour of need.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] There may be an alternative...
<color=#2eafff>If there's a chance, i'll take it.</color>

[ Captain Ty'nan ] While it is true that we Temple Guardians are forbidden from using the weapons of our enemy,@w2 there is no rule against using the weapons of our ancestors.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] When our forebears were exiled to this planet,@w2 they sealed away the technologies the Zirax had forbidden and hidden them,@w3 with The Order established to guard over the technology so that it would not be used or discovered.@p8 [ Shaman Dolmac ] What you speak of is blasphemy, Captain!@w3 Those devices were sealed away centuries ago for a reason!@w2 They do not even work!@p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Silence, Dolmac!@w3 This oath is as much mine as it is yours.@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] The devices we need are used in the construction of plasma and kinetic weaponry.@w4 You will find them not far from here, sealed deep within the Burial Chamber of those who once sealed them.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Go now, Commander.@w3 Prove yourself an ally of The Order; find the sealed crates and bring them back here.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] I will, Captain.@w4 You can count on me to complete the mission!@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Leave that Weapon Case you brought with me, Commander.@w5 My people are forbidden from using them,@w2 but the refugees we have taken in are not bound by the same oath.@w5 Good luck,@w2 and may the spirits guide you.
<color=#2eafff>Thank you, Captain.</color>\n<color=#2eafff>May the spirits guide you too...</color>

[ Shaman Dolmac ] I thought you were on your way to the ancient burial chamber to desecrate the memory of my ancestors, or was I wrong?@p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Is there something more you needed to know?
<color=#2eafff>Why can't you use zirax weapons?</color> <color=#bdbdbd>(Repeat last dialogue)</color>

[ Shaman Dolmac ]\nAlready give up, have you?@w4\nLeave this place, Terran.@w3 I will have you thrown from the heights of the temple if you return without good reason!

[ Shaman Ur'cera ] Welcome to our holy ziggurat, Commander.@w4 I will be replacing former-shaman Dolmac as the Shaman of the Moon.@w5 I thank you for helping us with the defense of the temple.@w3 May the spirits guide you to Empyrion, Commander.
<color=#2eafff>May the spirits guide you too, Shaman.</color>

[ Captain Ty'nan ] Come, quickly, Stranger!@w5 Tell me,@w2 were you successful?@w3 Do you have one of the sealed crates from the Burial Chambers?@p8 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Do not look so happy, Captain.@w3 You are condoning the desecration and robbery of a sacred place by an alien.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] I'll be as disconsolate as you Dolmac, when this is all over and we come out the other side alive.@w3 Until then, I will grasp whatever hope is dangled in front of my face.

[ Captain Ty'nan ] Excellent!@w4 According to the manifest in the Temple Archives, this crate contains Plasma Igniters used in the energy weapons of old.@w5 The knowledge of how to use them is the domain of the Order, not of the Temple Guardians however.@p9 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Out of the question, Captain!@w5 I will have no part in your self-destructive delusions!@w3 You will get us all killed!!@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Have you lost your mind, Dolmac?!@p6 [ Shaman Dolmac ] No!@w3 I am the only one in this entire place that is sane!@w2 It is YOU that have lost your minds!@w4 The Zirax are not our enemies!@w2 We must allow them into the temple and throw ourselves on their mercy!

[ Shaman Dolmac ] Just you, you HERETIC!@w3 You're here just trying to deceive the my people, my precious followers!@w3 But I will not let you!!@p8 < Dolmac lunges for the case! >@w4 - You raise the case away from his grasp and bring it down on his head -@p9 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Nicely done.@w4 I was about to do that myself.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Guardian Ulath!@w2 Shaman Dolmac is not well.@w4 Take him to his quarters and lock him inside until he has regained himself.@w5 And send Shaman Ur'cera over on your way out.@p8 [ Guardian Ulath ] Right away, Captain!@p5 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You must've hit him pretty hard, since you've managed to break the locks on the case, Commander.@w4 Here come's Shaman Ur'cera.@w3 He is more...@w3 worldly,@w2 than Dolmac.@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Can I help you, Captain?@w3 I'm rather busy organizing the barricading of the gates right now.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Forgive me for interrupting your preparations, Shaman Ur'cera but we have a case of vital equipment that is needed for the defense of the Ziggurat.@w3 It is a field outside my limited expertise and one you are uniquely qualified to handle,@w2 if you would.@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] A pretty speech, Captain.@w3 But i'm not Orizel, so get to the bloody point and tell me what you need me to do?

[ Shaman Ur'cera ] Why the bloody hell do you have that thing?!@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Like the captain said,@w2 it's needed for the defense of the Ziggurat.@w5 You shaman pass down the knowledge of this technology and how it's used, don't you?@w3 That means that using it is up to you.@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] But...@w2 I never expected to actually see one of these crates in person!@w4 There's not even enough parts here to make full weapons.@w3 The best we could manage is to modify the Guardian's Crossbows into some form of plasma launcher.@w4 @p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] That would probably be preferrable for most of us, Shaman.@w6 We have trained all our lives to use a crossbow;@w2 But none of us would know how to handle a rifle effectively.@p8 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Alright...@w3 I'll get some of the other Shaman together to put them to work.@w5 YOU, Captain...@w2 Get the men you can spare and bring us the weapons you need modified first.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] What should I do?@p5 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Get up top and help hold off the attack until we're done here.@w6 Now go!@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Thank you for everything you've done, Commander.@w5 May the Spirits guide you to Empyrion...

[ Shaman Dolmac ] No!@w2 No!@w2 I am loyal to this temple!@w4 And it is FOR this temple, FOR my people that we will be spared the genocide that YOU have wrought!!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] You sold out your own people to the Zirax!@w4 Why?!@w2 So you can take the place of High Shaman after they've killed everyone else?!@p7 [ Shaman Dolmac ] YES!@w4 That position is meant to be mine!@w3 Orizel is a fool and a fraud!@w4 None have been so attentive to the words of the spirits than me! ME!!@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You disgust me, Dolmac...@w5 I should kill you where you stand!@p6 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Then you would be violating your oath, GUARDIAN!@p5 [ Captain Ty'nan ] It would be worth it...@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Ulath!@w4 Arrest former Shaman Dolmac and place him in one of the Penitants Cells.@w4 Deny all claims of innocence or mercy and lock him in there.@w4 Send Shaman Ur'cena in here on your way out with the prisoner.@p7 [ Guardian Ulath ] Right away, Captain!@p5 [ Deranged Lunatic ] YOU'RE A TRAITOR TY'NAN!!@w4 YOU WILL ALL DIE!! ONLY THROUGH ME WILL YOU ALL BE SAVED!!!@p7 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] What in the bloody hell was that!?@w3 I want an explanation, Ty'nan!@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] My apologies, Shaman Ur'cera.@w3 It has come to light that Dolmac has been working with the Zirax to assume ascendancy to Orizel's position.@w8 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Impossible!@w3 There are a half-dozen of us that are better qualified for the role of High Shaman than him!@w3 He'd never be accepted!@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] I don't think he had that in mind, Shaman Ur'cera...@p5 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] That snivelling bastard!@w4 How'd you manage to catch him out?@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] The Commander here went to retrieve a case of equipment needed for the defense of the Ziggurat,@w2 which Dolmac was heavily opposed to.@w4 After being presented with the case,@w2 Dolmac refused to cooperate.@w3 When pressed, be confessed and...@w3 well,@w2 you saw the rest.@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] What's in that case anyway?

[ {PlayerName} ] Shaman Ur'cera!@w4 I see you finished putting together those plasma crossbows!@p7 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Yeah,@w2 but my hands are killing me and half the acolytes who were helping are out cold in their beds.@w3 But since you're in here and not out there or dead,@w2 i'm guessing we won.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] That's right, Shaman.@w3 The zirax have been beaten back and Captain Ty'nan is leading an advanced force to make sure they stay gone.@w6 I've gotta admit...@w3 Those plasma crossbows are very nice.@w3 I don't suppose you could make another one?@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] We're all outta parts, young man.@w3 If you want to go swimming around in some sunken crypts for more cases,@w2 go right ahead but you'll need to find someone else to make one for you.@w3 I'm done.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Ah,@w3 That's too bad...@w5 So what will you do now, Shaman?@p6 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Help Orizel re-establish order and then seek my bed.@w4 It's been a long day,@w2 and far too exciting.@w6 But it's not yet over for you, traveller.

[ {PlayerName} ] The Ziggurat is safe...@w4 What happened!?@w2 You're injured!@p7 [ Khalad ] I ran into...@w2 a random patrol on the way back here...@w3 I was careless...@w3 I thought they'd have pulled back the patrols for the attacks.@w6 You don't need to worry,@w2 i've already used a Trauma Kit...

[ Khalad ] The Drone Base...@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Are you insane?@w3 That base is the most heavily-fortified structure on the planet!@w3 It has an entire army stationed inside it!@p7 [ Khalad ] No it doesn't.@w3 Not anymore.@w4 A cycle ago when your vessels appeared in orbit, one of the Zirax's Corvettes was shot down over the previous Drone Base.@w4 It's nothing more than a crater right now.@p7 [ Khalad ] The new one they put up in it's place is made from the wreckage of the old one.@w4 It looks impressive, but has serious deficiencies caused by using parts from the corvette to fill in the gaps.@p8 [ Khalad ] Ow...@w4 I got a bit too excited there... @w6 Anyway,@w2 I watched them build the thing and i've scouted the place out a few dozen times.@w3 It's not impossible.@w3 But must be done on foot.

[ Khalad ] We're going for stealth.@w4 If you want to get shot out of the sky,@w2 there are worse ways.@w4 If we're detected too early, they'll call for reinforcements from the other bases and we'll never get in.@p8 [ Khalad ] The reason we'll need to go in on foot is because the turrets used on the Drone Base were taken from the Corvette.@w3 They were never designed to fire at a downward angle.@w4 That makes them virtually blind when covering anything shorter than the exterior walls of the Base.@p9 [ Khalad ] The real problem will be getting inside those walls without climbing over them, while the shield is still active.@w6 That's where that cargo shipment that I sabotaged comes into it.

[ Khalad ] The plan is broken up into two parts:@w4 The first is to move on-foot to the Cargo Transport that I spent hours sabotaging;@w2 Kill the guards,@w2 SILENTLY!@w4 Then offload their cargo of Demolition Charges.@p8 [ Khalad ] The second part is to sneak up to the Drone Base, also on-foot, place the Demolition Charges against the rear wall and blow our way in.@w6 We won't need to take down the shields or scale the wall, so we should be safe the whole way.@p8 [ Khalad ] Once inside, i'll make my way around the outside, while you disable the shields.@w4 From there,@w2 we make our way inside and take over the base.@w6 Simple!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I don't think you've thought this plan through very well, Khalad...@w5 There are a LOT of things that could go wrong.@p7 [ Khalad ] Yes,@w2 there are...@w5 I've scouted the place a dozen times and even watched them build the place.@w3 If you do exactly as I say, we'll be in without them even noticing.@p8 [ Khalad ] But first things first...@w4 We need to get those charges.@w6 You have my radio frequency, right?@w4 Good.@p7 [ Khalad ] I've sent the location where the Convoy's stopped to your AI.@w4 You'll approach to 500 meters,@w3 i'm sure either by ship@w2 or that wheeled contraption you ride around on.@w5 Then proceed on foot.@p7 [ Khalad ] The Convoy has the same kind of turret the Drone Base has, so as long as you're on the ground,@w2 you won't be shot.@w4 You need to be on foot to avoid being spotted by ground troops or you'll end up being attacked from both sides.@w5 You have a silenced weapon?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Shaman Ur'cera gave me this Crossbow.@w3 It should be quiet enough.@w3 Plus i've always wanted to use one of these things since I saw Ki'eve with one.@p8 [ Khalad ] Okay, good.@w5 Contact me by radio when you're 500 meters out from the Convoy.@w3 I'll start in from the opposite side.@w3 I may be a little late since i'm still recovering.@w4 May the spirits guide us, {PlayerName}.

[ Khalad ] Hello Geam.@w4 It's been a long time...@p6 [ Prisoner ] Yes,@w3 yes it has...@w5 How is your uncle?@w3 I always liked his sermons.@w3 So full of hope.@p7 [ Khalad ] He's alive and well.@w4 How's Torma?@w3 Either of you could've been chief in another cycle or two...@w4 If you hadn't screwed up so badly.@p7 [ Prisoner Geam ] Don't you dare stand there and lie to me, Khalad!@w4 If you hadn't left YOU would be the next one to be chief!@w3 You should have been our chief instead of letting that old fool clinging to his path of submission to the zirax!@p8 [ Khalad ] Him?!@w2 What about YOU?!@w6 Hundreds are dead,@w2 the Ziggurat was attacked and the Village is in ruins because you allied with these bastards!@w4 You started an all out war between the Tal'on and the Zirax and we are just not ready for it.@p9 [ Prisoner Geam ] And yet@w2 here you are...@w4 Not a prisoner like me.@w2 You're standing here inside the enemy's stronghold,@w2 a weapon in your hand and fire in your soul.@w4 You will be our chief.@w3 Our people will rise up,@w2 united in anger,@w2 finally with the will to fight.@p9 [ Khalad ] Is that why you did it, Geam?@w4 To get the people to fight?@w3 So you could stand there proudly as they're killed by weapons fired from orbit?!@w4 Is THAT how your 'master plan' is supposed to end?@w3 Because that's what will happen!@p9 [ Prisoner Geam ] No,@w2 it won't.@w5 The Zirax are weakened,@w3 their fleet is over-extended.@w4 The Legacy are reawakening and those stupid Zirax scum are busy with their own civil war.@w5 Now is the time for us to rise up,@w3 while we still can.
If this has all been about getting the Tal'on to rise up and fight the Zirax, why did you come after me?

[ Prisoner Geam ] I am truly sorry about that, Terran.@w6 I wasn't interested in justice or revenge against your people like the others.@w4 I merely saw a way in with the zirax,@w2 a way to spark the conflict@w4 and in you,@w2 I found an ally for my people.@w3 An ally with no agenda,@w3 one that could help them rise and make no demands of them.@p9 [ Prisoner Geam ] For what it's worth,@w3 I hope you can forgive me.@w5 But know this:@w3 If I were given the option I would make the same choice all over again.@w3 For the sake of my people...@p9 [ Khalad ] What about the rest of them, Geam?@w6 Why are you here while they're on their way with the Commander to one of the other Tal'on worlds?@w4 What's so special about Ampathos?@p8 [ Prisoner Geam ] I do not know.@w5 I know that is it one of the worlds that the Zirax exiled the survivors of The Purge to,@w2 an Ocean world.@w3 But they separated me from the others and confined me here before they told me any more... @p9 Hey!@w3 Over here!@w2 I know! I know!
<color=#2eafff>And uhh... who the hell are you?</color>

[ Prisoner Torv ] Hi there!@w2 My name's Torv.@w2 How's it goin'?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] You said you know something about this Ampathos planet?@w4 Care to tell us how you ended up in here?@p7 [ Prisoner Torv ] Oh, yeah, sure!@w5 I always fall asleep while on coms duty up in the control room.@w3 The Commander's a major hard-ass who's always beating on me because of it. @w6 Anyway...@w2 As payback I took a massive dump on the Commander's chair one night and...@w3 well, he walked in while I was mid-squat.@w3 It wasn't pretty.@p9 [ Prisoner Torv ] So yeah,@w3 He shot me in the head.@w2 And then@w2, then waited outside my clone chamber and shot me again!@w5 I can understand the first time,@w2 but a second time is a little extreme, don't you think?@w6 Well,@w2 now i'm in here with this guy, and he won't talk to me at ALL.@p9 [ Prisoner Torv ] So can you let me out now?@w3 This place looks like it's going to shit and you know,@w2 i'd really rather not be here right now.
You tell us what we want to know, then i'll let you out.

[ Prisoner Torv ] Deal!@w4 Okay, so it goes like this...@w5 About 17 months ago, one of Serdus big research labs on Ampathos went dark.@w2 Just 'poof!' gone.@p7 [ Prisoner Torv ] That's not a huge deal. Serdu labs have a habit of going kaput with all the dangerous stuff they poke.@w3 But this time, the two ships they sent to investigate never reported back either and no one knows why.@p8 [ Prisoner Torv ] The planet hasn't got anyone else living there,@w2 not even Polaris.@w4 Just this one lab, a few automated processing sites and a few floating Tal'on villages.@w4 The problem is that these Tal'on are now armed and not happy to see any more ships come dropping down on them.@w6 @p8 [ Prisoner Torv ] Those Tal'on friends volunteered to go down there and find out what happened down there and bring it all under control.@w2 Who does that?@w4 They're not like my fellow jailmate over there who's in it for the greater good.@p8 [ Prisoner Torv ] Okay.@w3 I spilled the beans, so let me out!

[ {PlayerName} ] I have returned!@w3 Did you finish what you wanted to do after the Drone Base, Khalad?@p7 [ Khalad ] Yes, I returned to my village and spoke with my uncle to inform him of the news.@w3 Reactions were...@w2 mixed.@w4 Now that the Drone Base is gone,@w2 none of my people know what to do.

[ Khalad ] Geam knows what he did was wrong and accepts the consequences of his actions.@w5 He would normally be either exiled from Tal'on Lands, forbidden all communication with the people...@w3 or he would be executed if he possessed valuable knowledge of our people that would fall into the hands of an enemy.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Well, he's already fallen into the enemy's hands...@w2 willingly.@w3 And he would probably survive for a long time on his own in the wilds right now.@w3 So he will be...@w2 executed?@p8 [ Khalad ] That would be the foregone conclusion normally...@w5 I think I will speak in his defense.

@d0This is a standard communications system employed by many factions across the galaxy, Commander. If you have a valid keycard, you can extract the information stored in the satellite's memory. Lacking a keycard, the only other way to retrieve the data is to hack the system's security and forcibly retrieve the data.@p9 @d0 If you attempt to hack the satellite, you will need to bypass the security system that will attempt to block your intrusion by shutting down data nodes one-by-one until it can cut off your connection to the system. At which point you will be booted from the system.@p9 @d0 In order to take control of the system, you must reach 100% capture before the Security System reaches 100% capture and locks you out of the system. To do this, you must hack adjacent data nodes and directories, but the security system will attempt to lock surrounding nodes.@p9 @d0 When you have entered a section of code, available adjacent nodes will be displayed as a list. Accompanying each Node is a measurement of Speed [S-?], Encryption [E-?] and Filesize [F-?] of the node. Ideally you would want to pick a node with High Speed, Low Encryption and Large Filesize.@p9 Speed: Determines the minimum amount of capture gained by the Hacker from hacking the node. Encryption: Determines the minimum amount of capture gained by the Security System from hacking the node. Filesize: Determines the maximum amount of capture gained by both the Hacker and the security system from capturing that node.@p9 Hacking software can be used to accelerate your own hacking or stall the security system, but is consumed in the process. Hacking Software - Spam: Overloads the system with junk data, revealing better nodes that were previously inaccessible. Hacking Software - Overclock: Hacks all surrounding Directories for +15% capture. Hacking Software - Fortify: Encrypts captured nodes reducing the Security System's Capture rate by 15%.@p9 You may also encounter Datavaults inside the computer system. These may give Software, Unlock Points or Credits. It is also important to note that some satellites have advanced processing systems and may be faster than others. Their processing speed is displayed on the main menu. If you fail to hack any satellite, the system will be permanently locked.

Welcome to the Class System, Commander.@w2 I will instruct you on each of the different Classes and what they specialize in and how to improve your own class level. First, you may choose only ONE Main character class.@w2 Only upon mastering that class, can you choose a second sub-class.@p9 You may only possess one main class and one sub class, Commander. However, there are special rank classes that can be obtained by completing any number of special tasks, events or achievements.@p9 Each character class has a unique set of missions used to increase the Class level up to a maximum of 5.@w2 With each increase in Class Level you will gain additional damage, reload speed, accuracy and reduced recoil for that class' chosen weapon types.@w2 The missions can be found in your PDA (F1) after you have chosen your preferred class.@p9 The available classes are: Soldier: Specializes in Automatic Rifles, Grenade and Rocket Launchers.@w2 Marksman: Specializes in Sniper Rifles, Laser Rifles and Crossbows.@w2 Agent: Specializes in Pistols, Submachine Guns and Laser Pistols.@w2 Vanguard: Specializes in Shotguns and Miniguns.@w2 Specialist: Specializes in Flamethrowers, Plasma Cannons and Alien Weaponry.@w2 Engineer: Non-combat class that specializes in Multitools, Drills and Chainsaws; with a bonus to Warp Drive range.@p9 These are your primary class choices, Commander.@w2 If you pick a class you are not comfortable with, you cannot change to another one. So ensure that you are picking the class with skills best suited to your combat style.@w2 Do you understand?

@d0<color=#ffffff>Here is the list of Main Character Classes that you can choose from, Commander.\nYou can examine the abilities of each class by selecting one from the menu. You can then confirm your choice on that class' page or return back to this menu.</color>
You can access the Class Selection and Statistics Screen via the PDA (F1) at any time by activating the mission 'Character Class System'

@d0Soldier Soldiers are frontline combatants trained in mid-range combat specializing in the use of Assault Rifles, Pulse Rifles, Grenade Launchers and Rocket Launchers. This also applies to enemy weapons of the same type. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Assault Rifle, Advanced Assault Rifle, Elite Assault Rifle, Heavy Assault Rifle Pulse Rifle, Advanced Pulse Rifle, Tactical Stealth Rifle, Energy Pulse Rifle Grenade Launcher, Rocket Launcher, Guided Rocket Launcher, Advanced Guided Rocket Launcher Zirax Combat Rifle, Zirax Rocket Launcher.

@d0Marksman Marksmen are expert shots with scoped weapons trained in long-ranged combat specializing in the use of Sniper Rifles, Laser Rifles and Crossbows. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons@p9 Applicable Weapons: Sniper Rifle, Heavy Sniper Rifle, M77 Anti-Tank Rifle, Zirax Marksman Rifle Laser Rifle, Advanced Laser Rifle, Plasma Rifle Repeating Crossbow, Plasma Crossbow

@d0Agent Agents are elite security personnel excelling in close-quarters combat specializing in the use of small arms including Pistols, Heavy Pistols, Laser Pistols and Submachine Guns. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons@p9 Applicable Weapons: M-5 Pistol, M-6 Holosight Pistol, Elite Combat Pistol, Starhawk Heavy Pistol LS-22 Laser Pistol, LS-38 Advanced Laser Pistol, DC-17 Heavy Laser Pistol Submachine Gun, Advanced Submachine Gun, Elite Submachine Gun

@d0Vanguard Vanguards are the frontrunners in open combat, able to lead the charge, breach doors and take a position and hold it. Specialized for close and mid-ranged combat they employ the use of Shotguns and Miniguns. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Shotgun, Combat Shotgun, Assault Shotgun, Zirax Heavy Shotgun Minigun, Advanced Minigun, Laser Minigun

@d0Specialist Specialist are a support class trained in the use of energy and incendiary weapons such as Plasma Cannons and Flamethrowers. They are also capable of modifying the Plasma Rifle to destabilize the projectiles, causing them to explode on contact damaging the surrounding area. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Plasma Cannon, High-Output Plasma Cannon, Plasma Rifle Flamethrower, Advanced Flamethrower, Plasma Blaster

@d0Engineer Engineers are a non-combatant class specializing in maintenance, harvest and salvage. Experts in the use of Multitools, Chainsaws and Drills, both handheld and ship-mounted. They are also skilled Warp Technicians, able to boost the range of a typical Warp Drive by a few lightyears above the norm. Each Class Level increases Tool Damage, Reload Speed and increases the maximum warp distance of any Warp Drive.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Survival Multitool, Multitool, Advanced Multitool Chainsaw, Mechanical Drill, Laser Drill, Enhanced Laser Drill HV, SV and CV Drills, Drill Turrets, Multiturrets and Harvest Modules Gains +2 Lightyear warp range per class level

Congratulations, Commander. You have now confirmed {MainClass} as your Main Character Class.@w2 You will not be able to change your class again; But when you have successfully leveled your current class to level 5, you may choose a Sub-Class, that will allow you to obtain new skills.@p9 You can check your current Class Statistics at any time by activating the Class System mission in your PDA (F1). Good luck Commander.

<color=#ffffff>The goal of Blazar is to add random numbers between two possible values to reach the total value of </color><color=#00ff00>20</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>
<color=#ffffff>The closer you come to 20, the higher the return on your bet.</color>
<color=#ffffff>But if you reach </color><color=#ff0000>21 or higher</color><color=#ffffff>, your game ends and you win nothing.@p9</color>
<color=#ffffff>You can cash out at any time, and if you are within a few points of the target 20, you may return more money than you bet.</color>
<color=#ffffff>With the option of high-stakes betting, you can win a significant amount of credits.</color>

Welcome to Chemmix Industrial. Oh, it's you. Thanks to your help, we're up and running again. We're still a little short on supplies so we can't handle third-party industrial supply, only small scale chemical production. That's enough for your own personal needs, but we ain't servicing any corporations today.
I won't take up any more of your time then

Welcome to Chemmix Industrial.\nSorry, but we're currently not in any shape to handle any Industrial or Personal orders right now.@w3\nWe've got a burst tank, leaking pipes and the main production line is completely out of order. We're also completely out of the supplies to fix the problems.
<color=#0088ff>I can help with the burst tank</color>
<color=#0088ff>I can help with the leaking pipes</color>

You're damned right I need help,@w2 and i'll take anything I can get!@w3 I don't need workers for this, I just need the supplies i'm missing. Then I can get this place back up and running and will be able to handle your orders.@p9 What I need is: x40 Plastic Tubes x8 Flux Coils x8 Glass Plates x8 Advanced Capacitors x16 Energy Regulators x48 Titanium Plates@p9 Those parts are needed to repair the containers that hold the Pentaxium Catalysts used for many of the chemical reactions. Think you can handle that? If The Company won't help, I'll pay you out of my own pocket if I have to.
<color=#0088ff>I've got the supplies you needed right here</color>

Thanks for all your help! I'll put this to use immediately and get this operation back up to speed! Won't be long before we can handle industrial orders for someone other than Polaris.@p9 So, i'm authorized to pay for supplies out of the company's budget and Polaris will foot the bill, so here's {MoneyCounter} Credits, which should almost cover the cost of the supplies. You've saved the Company time and effort too, so they've added {RepCounter} to your Company Reputation.@p9 Although not discussed, i'm giving you a bonus out of our current shipment simply because I feel like it. 5 Shipments of XO-23 Chemicals and another 15 Chem-Filters. And thanks again for all your help!

I don't need more unskilled workers, what I need are some new tanks that can hold corrosive and radioactive chemicals. I don't think you'll be able to carry those around in your pocket and we can't unload from connected ships@p8 That means I need to repair the ones i've got and that takes resources. x2000 Carbon Substrate x200 Mechanical Components x50 Motors x25 Electronics x8 Computers@p9 That should be enough to patch the burst tanks and seal them, with new motorized pump valves that'll make sure they don't burst again. Think you can handle that? If The Company won't help, I'll pay you out of my own pocket if I have to.
<color=#0088ff>I've got the repair materials with me</color>

It's not a hard job, I just need supplies I don't have on-hand to patch some of the old pipes with corrosion-resistant materials. The gods know i'm all out of patches with plenty of leaky pipes, so i'll appreciate any help you can give@p9 What i'll need is: x50 Aluminium Foil x150 Cobalt Alloy The first is to keep the pipes insulated, the second is to re-line the pipes. Think you can handle that? I'll pay you out of my own pocket if The Company won't help.
<color=#0088ff>I've brought the supplies you need to patch those pipes</color>

If you can get me the supplies the Polaris Head Office promised me months ago then I can get this efficiency back up.@p9 What I need to get started is: x80 Bottles of Nitrogen We need that Nitrogen for half the industrial processes we do here, both as a reactant and as a refridgerant for some of the more volatile tanks. You probably won't be able to carry all that, so equip a Transportation Booster or two on your armor.@p9 The problem is that there's currently a shortage of Nitrogen everywhere. The only places you'll be able to find it is gas refineries and gas harvesters. It'll be expensive from anywhere but a gas harvester, but i'll try and cover the costs...
<color=#0088ff>I managed to track down some Nitrogen</color>

I don't need any volunteer workers if that's the help you're offering. What I really need is some radiation shielding for the Pentaxium Catalyst tanks. They're leaking Radiation and I can't get any of my guys to go near it.@p9 So i'm giving you the choice of either bringing my guys x6 Radiation Boosters for their suits OR x6 Radiation Shielding to armor the tanks Radiation Boosters are expensive, but easy to buy. Radiation Shielding on the other hand is cheaper, but you'll need to get them from a factory.@p9 I don't think Polaris will cover the kind of repayments for refitting my guys' suits. So that's the problem we're faced with here.

<color=#ffffff>Not right now.\nYou've really helped me and the boys out here in getting up to speed.@w2\nWe still have a huge quota from </color><color=#ffbb00>Polaris</color><color=#ffffff>, but we can still handle small orders for you as a preferred customer.</color>

<color=#ffffff>You've really helped us out already, but if you're willing to help us out further i'll be glad of the help.@w2</color>\n<color=#ffffff>We're still not at peak efficiency and I doubt we'll ever get there without a complete shut down and getting a full refit.\nThat'll take us months, so the best we can do is make do with what we've got.</color>
<color=#0088ff>I can help with the burst tank</color>
<color=#0088ff>I can help with the leaking pipes</color>

Welcome to Com-Hazard Processing.\nWe handle waste processing of toxic contaminants and commercial processing of waste materials, turning it into resellable resources.\nWelcome back {PlayerName}! Got a job for us?
I won't take up any more of your time then

Welcome to Com-Hazard Processing.\nNormally i'd welcome any customers or guests that come down to this disgusting cesspool that Polaris has us running here, but we've got a jam in the main turbine that's overstrained the engines and caused structural damage.\nSo we're out of commission right now and can accept no new orders.

This is just what we needed! I'll pass this onto the boys in the tanks and we'll see if that fixes the problems we've got. Thanks for the assistance. I know it's none of your business.@p9 Here's a bit of compensation for your help. It's out of my discretionary funds for crew rewards. {MoneyCounter} Credits isn't much but should be enough to compensate you for help. I'll put in a good word with polaris, so they'll added {RepCounter} to your Reputation.@p9 Just so you know how grateful I am for your help, i'm also supplying you with some of our products. I'm sure you can find a use for them.

You've done enough already with just helping fixing one of our problems. I wouldn't want to inconvenience you further.\nIf you're really determined to help us out here, well... i'm not one to refuse your help.\nPolaris sure isn't pitching in.

This isn't your problem and this is a crappy job to offer assistance with, so i'm not gonna ask again. But if you're sure you want to help, i'm not one to look a gift horse in the mouth.@p9 What i'll need first is: x120 Bags of Cement To fill in the cracks where the turbine's engine ripped through the concrete foundations. Now, you probably won't be able to carry that and we're not allowed to unload connected ships here. So you'll need to get some Transportation Boosters in your suit to hold the weight. I know, it sucks, but those are Polaris' safety laws in actions.

We've got raw chemicals and sewage from two different treatment tanks that are leaking and the stuff is toxic. We can't do anything to patch the cracks in the tanks until that crap is safe enough for the boys to work around. What we need is a something that can be dumped onto the mess to neutralize it, but we don't have anything like that on hand.@p9 If you can bring me: x500 Salt I can pour the stuff on the spill and the boys can patch the tanks. You'll be hard-pressed to find that stuff around here. You can dig it up from the ocean floor, sea cliffs and the seashore from the sand around there.I'll pay you out of my own pocket for it if I have to.
<color=#0088ff>You should be able to clean up the spill with this.</color>

We've got two cracked tanks leaking toxic wastes and a third that's turbine has seized. If it's not restarted soon, the mass will harden and we'll never get it restarted.@p9 In the meantime, a temporary fix will do. So what I need right now is: x22 Chemicals XO-23 Chemicals from Chemmix Industrial should keep the tanks fluid until I can get replacement parts for the turbine engine and get it churning again. You bring me 22 bottles of XO-23 and I'll pay you back.
<color=#0088ff>I've got some Chemicals for you, chief</color>

The turbine on tank #3 has seized and the mass in the tank is at risk of hardening into something harder and... nastier than concrete. I'll have to demolish the entire tank to fix it if it goes completely solid. So I need to get the turbine in the tank churning away again.@p9 The engine underneath the tank is the problem, but it needs x50 Energy Regulators x30 Motors x15 Flux Coils In order to get it up and running again.@p9 Fortunately, it's not a big order so a standard constructor should be able to produce the components from raw materials fairly easy. If you're able to bring me the parts, I can fix the turbine and pay you for the trouble.

I'm happy to get any help I can get at this point, but it'll take a miracle to fix the generator that burned out when the turbines seized. It's basically wrecked. It'll need an entirely new mounting in order to get it working again.@p9 So the choice here is to bring me either x1 Large Generator and replace the entire generator OR x10 Spare Parts to repair the existing one Replacing the generator would be easier, but transporting it will require a full set of Transportation Boosters to carry it. The spare parts don't require any infrastructure, but you'll need to find a factory that makes them first.@p9 Ultimately, The generator is more expensive but easier. The spare parts are harder to get, but cheaper. I'll stand by whichever decision you make.

<color=#ffffff>No, everything's fine now, thanks to you.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>We've got the tanks fixed and the turbines running, so everything's back to business.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thanks again for all your help.</color>
I'll leave you to it then

Welcome to Solaris AMP Manufacturing.\nThis is our factory floor where we produce our signature products such as Generators, Solar Cells and Fusion Cores from raw materials.\nWe recently had a Radiation Storm impact factory performance, but we're back in action again.

Welcome to Solaris AMP Manufacturing.\nI'm sorry but we don't do factory tours and thanks to a radiation storm we're currently in the middle of shutting down our processes while a repair crew works on restoring the facility.

<color=#ffffff>Ah, it's you.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thank you for your assistance thus far. Because of you, we don't have to shut down for repairs.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You're right, there is still much to do and if you're willing to help the factory get back up to speed there's a reward waiting for you.</color>
I'll leave you to it then

Ah, thank you so very much, sir! Your assistance in this matter is very welcome and i'll see to it that you're paid accordingly!@w3 {MoneyCounter} Credits should be enough to cover your expenses and for the help, Polaris will add a further {RepCounter} to your Company Reputation.@p9 Polaris takes care of it's subsidiary businesses like us. Especially when they're as important to them as Solaris AMP! I'll even include one of our premier products as a reward to show how much your help means to us!

Oh dear, you're one of our clients aren't you? I couldn't possibly ask you to help us with repairs! We're just short of a few supplies needed to bring the factory back online that we don't stock ourselves. If you're genuine in your offer, we're not in any position to refuse.@p9 Now, the recent Radiation Storm we had was quite a terrible ordeal and one of the things that happened was that our transmitters were struck by lightning and now need to be completely replaced. x12 Communications Equipment is what the repair crew tell me we're short on.@p9 We don't stock replacements, so you'll need to purchase them from an Electronics Manufacturer. They're not standard fare in trade stations, so you'll need to order them directly from a factory much like ours.
<color=#0088ff>I've managed to get my hands on some Communications Equipment</color>

Regrettably, static discharge inside a storage silo from a radiation storm fused our graphite stockpiles into worthless slag. We can't restart production without a shipment of graphite and that's where one of the largest problems stems from@p9 If you can bring me: x450 Graphite I'll be able to get production up earlier. I know it's not actually a repair, but since this benefits everyone and with our communications array still being repaired, we can't call for resupply. Worry not! I will compensate you well above market price for the materials!
<color=#0088ff>I have a shipment of graphite with me</color>

The production line is down since an overload caused by radiation damage created a self-destructive error routine in the robotics and they proceeded to dismantle each other before the power was cut.@p9 We can't reassemble them since they did it rather violently, so a complete replacement of: x5 Robotics In order to get the secondary production line working again. But since our FTL transmitters are still being repaired we can't call for replacement. You should be able to get them from Non-Linear Productions or Hostile Apparatus.

Overcharging blew out the capacitor stack on the laser cutter when it was rebooted after the Radiation storm. The automated system isn't set to check for a capacitor being OVERcharged, so it made a spectacular mess.@p9 If your help is genuine, the capacitors need to be replaced. x40 Advanced Capacitors x8 Energy Regulators x5 Power Coils This time they'll have an Energy Regulator to ensure they output safely next time there's a bad radiation storm... or so the repair crew tell me.@p9 These are rather expensive components, so you will be compensated by Polaris appropriately for their cost. Well above market value!
<color=#0088ff>I have the replacement parts for the capacitors.</color>

While i'm glad of your offer, I think this one may be beyond even your abilities. My repair crew sure is stumped on how to deal with the problem at hand. The nanolathing lasers used to treat the Solar Cells have somehow vented their supply of Xenon.@p9 That means the laser heads require: x50 Xenon Gas Bottles to replenish their reserves. Xenon is a very rare gas and very valuable. I don't know anywhere you could even get it aside from a gas harvester.

<color=#ffffff>Thank you for your assistance. But we can take it from here.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Imagine the scandal if our competitors knew we put our clients to work in our factory!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I'd rather not risk imposing on you any further.</color>

Welcome to PentMaxIt! The industry leaders in Pentaxium-based warp fuels.\nWelcome to one of our processing plants where we refine the raw ore into our signature products!\nIf you'd like to schedule a delivery to a new trade or supply station, you'll need to contact my secretary for an order form.

Welcome to PentMaxIt! The industry leaders in Pentaxium-based warp fuels.\nWelcome to one of our processing plants where we refine the raw ore into our signature products!@p8\nUnfortunately, we're not doing any group tours of the factory today because of a disgruntled former employee that decided to resign by opening several processing tanks and vats and dump their contents on the floor on his way out.
<color=#ffffff>I'm afraid we won't be able to do any factory tours. Even after all your help, it's going to be some time before we can resume our normal schedule.</color>
I'll leave you to it then

Your assistance in this matter is greatly appreciated! I'm sorry that we can't offer you a factory tour like we do for all our guests because of a certain someone. To show our gratitude for your assistance and understanding in this trying time PentMax-It would like to offer {MoneyCounter} Credits and {RepCounter} Reputation with our parent company, Polaris Megacorp.@p9 Polaris takes the disruptive actions of rogue employees very seriously and will strive to ensure such unpleasantness doesn't happen again.@w3 Thank you again for your understanding in this matter. Please accept this shipment of Pentaxid as a consolation.

I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, but we're short on supplies for such a large clean up since we never expected someone to intentionally dump the contents of multiple tanks and vats onto the factory floor!@p9 We've currently exhausted the supplies we had and are weeks away from getting replenished. x34 Filters are minimum of what we need after the corrosive fumes destroyed half the plant's air filters and damaged many of the ventilators. If we don't replace them soon, we may have to shut down as the air quality becomes dangerous.
<color=#0088ff>I've got some Air Filters on me</color>

I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, but we're simply not equipped to handle this amount of toxic materials on the factory floor! The work crews can't spend longer than a few minutes before their rebreathers burn out from the fumes.@p9 If we had... x4 Oxygen Tank Boosters for the crew's suits, they could get the work done in a quarters of the time without needing to constantly check that the toxins haven't melted through their masks.
<color=#0088ff>I have some spare oxygen tanks if you need them</color>

I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, but we're constantly dealing with more problems in an never-ending cascade of system failures that we weren't prepared for! The latest one is with the vats that were dumped...@p9These vats are shielded against radiation and corrosion on the inside, but are just regular steel on the outside and the chemicals poured over the side have corroded the vats from the outside-in so we can't use them anymore.@p9 We can't even bring in new vats, so our only hope is cut out and replace the walls with x20 Radiation Shielding. They're big and heavy. Intended mostly for use on Fusion Reactors. But they're the only thing we can get here, as long as someone has Transportation Boosters enough to carry them in through the door.

I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, but we've still got the problem of cleaning the toxic sludge from off the factory floor. We've got work crews on it, but they're doing it by hand after the vaccuum pumps burned out from the radiation.@p9 In order to repair and harden the pumps against the liquid we need: x72 Plastic Tubes x32 Advanced Electronics x16 Motors x8 Platinum Plates to make them resistant to the toxic sludge. But I have no idea where we'd even find platinum plates!

Thanks to your assistance we've managed to get all the toxic chemicals cleaned up and are back in business!\nUnfortunately, we still won't be running any factory tours until Polaris sends an official team to review the damages.\nBut we can still sell you any PentMax-It products, at a fair discount!

I'm afraid we're still cleaning up, probably the largest problem is that the floor panels are completely corroded from the Pentaxium Hexafluoride that was poured on them. Even if we manage to clean it all off, it will still be dangerously radioactive.@p9 Honestly, I think it would be cheaper to replace the entire section of floor rather than try and decontaminate the entire floor. If you know anyone with: x400 Titanium Plates I'll buy them off them unseen for 50% above market price if it means getting rid of this headache!
<color=#0088ff>I just happen to have 400 Titanium Plates on me.</color>

Uhh... yeah, this is InterWeapon Manufacturing We make ammunition and weapons in this facility, it's not so much a shop as it is a supplier to the InterWeapon and InterWep outlets across this quadrant. We do bulk orders for military and security forces as well. So... what are you here for?

Uhh... yeah, this is InterWeapon Manufacturing\nAre you the guy Polaris sent? We've been shortstaffed all week and need those supplies.\nWe can't fill any of our major contracts until you bring in those supplies. You're already two week late and we'll have to shut down if it takes any longer.

<color=#ffffff>The guys Polaris sent still haven't turned up, so may have bought us a few days with your help but unless they turn up soon we've only delayed the inevitable.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Still willing to lend a hand?</color>

Thank the gods we don't have to shutdown! I hope whoever Polaris sent has a good excuse. I hate being indebted to anyone and it'll be on their head when they turn up. Look, here's {MoneyCounter} Credits and {RepCounter} Reputation with Polaris to make up for the trouble.@p9 It probably won't cover the trouble, but here's a shipment of our products here. I'm sure you'll find a use for them.

You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 The current order is for... x1000 Elemental Pentaxid that's used as the ignition source in plasma cartridges to vaporize the Erestrum gel and charge the weapon's capacitors. I'll pay you above market price for the order.
<color=#0088ff>I have the shipment of Elemental Pentaxid for you</color>

You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 The current order on the board for today is: x650 Sulfur, about a ton. We need it to mass-produce ammunition, and we're down to our last container. It's not something you can pick up from your local trade station, you'll need to find an industrial supplier or mine it yourself from the surface of Lava Planets.

You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 The current order on the board for today is: x1 Large Upgrade Kit. We don't build these here, or at all. These are produced in the Zirax Empire, but we've got a custom order for some heavy weapons. You bring me one of these and i'll pay you 75k on delivery. No questions asked.

You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 The current order on the board for today is: x50 Advanced Capacitors used in the current production line of Laser Rifles. We ran out a week ago, so the entire shipment has been put on hold while we resupply, but they still haven't turned up yet and we're going to end up going back on the contract.

You're not with the ship Polaris sent to bring us supplies, but you'll do. I'll even pay you if you can bring in the materials we use at this factory. Without a resupply, we'll be forced to shut down within a week.@p9 Already we've been forced to shelve production on a line of Baryonic Laser Cannons because we're missing the: x30 Heat Exchangers used to keep the laser array from overheating. We were being supplied by another factory, but the shipment was being transported by the same freighter.
<color=#0088ff>I've got some Heat Exchangers for you</color>

<color=#ffffff>Thanks to you, we won't need to shutdown for at least a month, maybe two.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If the freighter carrying our resupply doesn't turn up in the next day or two, i'll file a report with </color><color=#ffbb00>Polaris </color><color=#ffffff>and see if they can get another shipment out.</color>\n<color=#ffbb00>We're always short on sulfur though, if you can bring us more we can exchange it for Nitro.</color>

We're always short on Sulfur around here and the shipments and price are always irregular.\nIf you ever end up with sulfur you can't sell, we take shipments of 500 and will exchange it for our surplus of Nitrocellulose.\nMake sure you're connected to a ship so we can unload it all.

<color=#ffffff>Thanks. We never have enough sulfur, so any help you can provide is appreciated.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>This is strictly off-books by the way, so </color><color=#ffbb00>Polaris </color><color=#ffffff>has no idea i'm doing this and I think we'd both prefer it if they didn't find out.</color>

This is Hostile Apparatus' production line... I don't normally deal with customers, but the overseer is on vacation. We uhh... make robotics here. Defensive mechs for protecting private property for the most part. You ever seen those Combat Androids? Yeah, we make those here. Cybernetic prosthetics too.

This is Hostile Apparatus' production line... I don't think you're supposed to be in here. I'm...@w3 tired. I don't have time for any more problems.@w3 The overseer went on vacation this week and now i'm stuck with double duty, and I swear that ass intentionally left so he could dump this mess on me!@w3 Err... i'm sorry. This isn't your problem.

<color=#ffffff>God, yes.@w2 Still overworked. Still no sleep.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're still willing to help, I could certainly use it so I can take a break. I've been on my feet for almost 2 days straight now.</color>

Praise be to Empyrion, for whoever sent you my way! Here! Take this {MoneyCounter} Credits and i'll personally write a commendation for {RepCounter} Reputation with Polaris for all your help with this nightmare. I'll finally get to see my bed tonight! Hell, take these spare robotics as well. You've possibly saved my life, if not my sanity.

Gods, i'm so tired.@w3 If you can help me out so I can take a break from this mess the overseer dumped on me, i'll be eternally grateful.@p9 I've got a backlog of orders going back almost 2 months. This one i'm holding right here is for... x375 Graphite. We use it in the ceramic armor on Android's chestpieces and I checked the storage crates and we're completely out of Graphite!
<color=#0088ff>I have a box of graphite you might be interested in</color>

Yes, still overworked. But at least i'll see my bed tonight.@w3 If I ever get my hands on the overseen, i'm going to throw him off the roof for letting things get this bad.@p9 I've got a backlog of orders going back almost 2 months. This one i'm holding right here is for... x12 Communication Equipment. These are used on the command units for issuing orders and they're so important that we can't ship out any Boxguard Mechs without them.

I need to get off my feet, just for a few hours.@w3 If you'll give me a hand in clearing these backlogged orders, I can pay you and maybe i'll finally get some rest.@p9 This order i'm working on right now needs... x16 Coolant. We're short on just about everything, which makes me wonder if the overseer was ever actually doing his job. You'd need a Transportation Booster just to carry. We sell those, by the way.
<color=#0088ff>I've got some extra coolant on me.</color>

Still working my way through these piles of old work orders and backlogged contracts.@w3 If you're looking to place your own order, you're going to have to wait until this lot is cleared up before I can accept anything new.@p9 This order right here is ridiculous! It should've been handled a month ago, but here it is. x50 Cobalt Alloy x32 Advanced Electronics x24 Motors x16 Computers.@p9 These are all for a new line of prosthetics and they're still an option on our order forms and the factory doesn't stock ANY of the main components!

I can barely concentrate on what i'm doing. I thought i'd filled this same order 3 times, but I just checked and I haven't finished it. I don't think I can finish it. I'm missing the Optronics used in the sensor heads.@p9 Can you help me out and find me some Optronics? Not the bridges or the matrices, just: x4 Optronics I'll pay you double their market value, if you can get them to me before I collapse.
<color=#0088ff>I've got those Optronics you asked for</color>

<color=#ffffff>Gods... I'm finally out of work orders.@w3</color>
<color=#ffffff>I'm long overdue for a nap, and at least the overtime alone will let me go on vacation.@w3</color>
<color=#ffffff>I'm damned well going to file a formal complaint with Polaris about the condition the overseer left the factory in as well.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Thanks for saving my sanity.</color>

Welcome to Thermal Interactions Ltd. A subsidiary of Polaris Megacorp.\nWe're the current leaders in thermal technology and supplies; from coolant to heat exchangers and heat sinks for beam weapons.\nWe supply industrial, military, and private enterprises with high-grade temperature regulation equipment.

Welcome to Thermal Interactions Ltd. A subsidiary of Polaris Megacorp. We're the current leaders in thermal technology and supplies; from coolant to heat exchangers and heat sinks for beam weapons. Is what i'd like to claim, but productivity has been falling lately and we're risking dropping down a few ranks in the Trade Index.@p9 You look like a pilot, a go-getter, a fellow of action. Do you think you can help me out here?

Ah, yes.\nYou've managed to waylay our descent down the Trade Index this cycle, but unless something is done we won't go up either.@w3\nIf you're interested in some more payment in exchange for some grunt work, I can provide.

Excellent work! This can only improve our standing on the Trade Index.@w2 Here. Here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits and i'll make sure you're recognized by Polaris your help in this endeavour. Let's say... {RepCounter} Reputation?@p9 Oh, and please take these Heat Exchangers. Use them yourself or give them to your friends. Make sure they know they're from Thermal Interactions Ltd!

We're always short on supplies around here. We're rather remote and don't get a lot of regular shipments. Which is what I need you to do: Bring me x100 Aluminium Foil. It's one of the things we use in our Large Heat Sinks and while we've got plenty today, we'll need to pay exceed to order more.

I knew I was right about you! What i'm looking for some help with is that I need someone that can bring me x250 Gold Ingots. They're used in the company's signature Heat Exchangers and we never have enough and when an order comes through, they charge us double. Double!!

That's the attitude I like to see! What I need from you is to head on to Chromium-Sierra Sciences and get me... x4 Scientific Equipment. They're one of the only companies that make Science Equipment that we need for measuring the thickness of the radiator vents in our heat sinks. So they're very important.

Our Heat Exchangers have microchannels filled with non-reactive Helium, but one of our tanks was emptied for a co-worker's birthday party. Now we're a little short for this week's quota.@p9 I'll need you to bring me: x50 Helium Bottles So we can speed up the manufacturing process instead of delaying it for our regular shipment. I know, not quite what you signed up for. But you'll be compensated for your trouble.

Many of the products we make here are made from Titanium; but since our last shipment of Titanium Ingots ran afoul of pirates on it's way here, we've been needing to prioritize contracts.\nYou'd really help us out if you could bring in a fresh supply of:\nx750 Titanium Ingots

<color=#ffffff>We're well on our way back up the </color><color=#66ccff>Trade Index</color><color=#ffffff> thanks to your efforts.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Please feel free to purchase from our catalogue. I'll always make time to fill out your order.</color>

Welcome to Chromium-Sierra Sciences.\nIn this facility we produce the finest in medical and scientific equipment, used all across the galaxy.\nFrom hospitals to research stations, nothing beats Chromium-Sierra!

Welcome to Chromium-Sierra Sciences.\nIn this facility we used to produce the finest in medical and scientific equipment, used all across the galaxy.\nWe're facing a shutdown after a biological speciment in one of the labs got free, and now we're looking at an official enquiry!

<color=#ffffff>You're willing to help?</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Well, the enquiry is still some time off and if we can get all the mess cleaned up and our supplies restocked we can downplay the incident and get off with a slap on the wrist.</color>

Things are looking up, thanks to you! With this mess on the way to being cleaned up, we might just pass the inspection with nothing worse than a warning. Here's {MoneyCounter} Credits to cover your expenses and an official {RepCounter} Reputation Bonus with Polaris.@p9 Polaris hates it when productivity drops in any sector. So they'll have no problem supporting your activities and will fully endorse any free samples I hand out, like these. Enjoy. And thank you again.

If you're willing to help and keep the inspectors from digging too deeply into our little industrial accident, then i'll pay you for bringing in:\nx400 Xenomaterial\nTo replace our stores of the hazardous material. This was originally the cause of the outbreak. Some of it wasn't inert.
<color=#0088ff>I've got your Alien goop. You actually use this?</color>

If you'll help us keep the inspectors from investigating our problem, i'll surely repay you for your help. We need to replace our stocks of x45 Helium Bottles Which are used to keep hazardous biomaterials in an inert atmosphere in which they cannot spread during transit. We exhausted our supplies containing the outbreak.

Since you're so willing to help us hide the severity of the incident, i'll pay you above market price for replacing the x24 Superconductors That were destroyed during the event. We can't order more without raising suspicion about the amount of damage done. Arriake Technology manufactures them.

Excellent! We're always short on glass plates around here and we lost a fair number in the incident, so I'll need you to bring me: x150 Glass Plates Don't worry. You'll be compensated for your trouble with a little extra on top.

We took a lot of damage to the lab's containment vessel that ended up venting our backup oxygen tanks so we're currently lacking reserves for our clean room facilities:\nx50 Oxygen Bottles\nAre all we need to recover our reserves and resume normal procedures in the clean rooms.
<color=#0088ff>I've brought you some of my spare oxygen tanks.</color>
